snippet.title: ReCore Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Presenting ReCore, an XBOX ONE & WINDOWS 10 EXCLUSIVE – Available September 13 -  Pre-order Now 

Waking on the world of Far Eden, Joule Adams finds she is not alone, but armed with both her father's guiding words and a host of Corebot companions.

From the legendary creator Keiji Inafune and the makers of Metroid Prime comes ReCore, an action-adventure crafted for a new generation.
